00098             function                common_view( $Options )
00099             {
00100                   try
00101                   {
00102                         $AdBannerAccess = get_package( 'ad::ad_banner::ad_banner_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00103                         $Banners = $AdBannerAccess->select( 0 , 100 );
00104                         shuffle( $Banners );
00105                         $Banners = array_slice( $Banners , 0 , 10 );
00106                         
00107                         $this->Output = '';
00108                         
00109                         foreach( $Banners as $k => $v )
00110                         {
00111                               $this->Output .= $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'ad_banner_view_common_view.tpl' );
00112                               $this->Output = $this->String->print_record( $this->Output , $v );
00113                         }
00114                   }
00115                   catch( Exception $e )
00116                   {
00117                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00118                   }
00119             }
00120             
00143             function                view( $Options )
00144             {
00145                   try
00146                   {
00147                         $ContextSet = get_package_object( 'gui::context_set' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00148                         
00149                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_ad_banner_view_common_view' );
00150                         
00151                         $ContextSet->execute( $Options , $this , __FILE__ );
00152                         
00153                         return( $this->Output );
